title: Drawing, "Fantastic Garden", ca. 1700
medium:
Pen and brown ink, black chalk
Support: off-white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink, within ruled borders, at bottom: Veduta di Giardino Carlo Antonio Buffagnotti inv. fece; in pen and black ink on verso: D; in red ink: 66, covered with a pasted label inscribed: 27
provenance: From the Collection of Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Fantastic Garden", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Pen and brown ink, black chalk
Support: off-white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-2993.
